text:
The RealReal | San Francisco ONSITE | Product Engineers

I’m the Director of Consumer Products Engineering at the foremost name in luxury consignment - therealreal.com - and am looking to build out my team by a few key frontend-leaning, full-stack, Rails people.

The company is Series E stable and our HQ is located on the sixth floor of a building near Fisherman’s Wharf with sweeping panoramic views of the bay. Our salaries are competitive and we still have equity to offer.

Interview process : 1) initial phone screen 2) tech phone screen 3) onsite 4) offer

Lead Ruby On Rails Engineer, Consignor Web https://www.therealreal.com/careers/9789EB23A8

Senior Ruby On Rails Engineer, Consumer Web https://www.therealreal.com/careers/3928DE4896
